website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 is gorgeous on the outside thanks to a slick and slim design and a sharp rear touch-screen LCD. This rugged pocket camera is waterproof to 16 feet, but its image quality is very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after first time use in shallow ocean waters.
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning this item as it stopped working after using once in ocean water. Very disappointing as was not able to use for the snorkeling adventure that was planned the day after. I had checked and rechecked to insure that the slots were properly secured. I soaked it in warm water for 10 minutes or more then wiped it dry. Then I re-charged the battery thinking that perhaps it stopped as the battery ran out(although I doubted it as I used only for a short period of time). Still did not work even if I followed the instructions, so I had to quickly purchase another underwater camera for the outing(a Canon Powershot D20-which worked really well).
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: It was a great little camera, until....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my husband in December 2012. It took great pictures, he used it on his 17 foot sailboat for filming and picture taking. The photos were great! Then... We took it to the beach in July of this year and it suddenly stopped working. My husband sent it to Sony for repair and lo and behold, they told us the same thing they've told others here. It was our fault moisture got into the camera. My husband apparently "abused" it. They offered to sell us a new camera for $200, yeah right.... We paid $149.99 for this one. We told them no thanks. I guess we're out $150 and a waterproof camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good photos, bad video, bad low light
customer_reviews.text: Focusing the lens is a big problem. It never really wants to work. Especially in video mode, it prefers peripheral objects close to the camera over center objects. NO centered weighted average seems to be available. My Samsung S4 phone takes better video 75% of the time! The only decent part is image stabilization, but that's to be expected. Photos seem to be good quality, if they can focus. Burst mode seems to have trouble focusing. 4x zoom is very low, but this is expected as the camera does not have a protruding lens. Touch screen is a horrible interface.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kenneth Perlstein

customer_reviews.title: Great little point-and-shoot
customer_reviews.text: As a photographer, I am very skeptical of anything that does not have a view finder but this camera is a great little point-and-shoot. It's cousin was my graduation present over 6 years ago and I loved that little camera for as long as it lasted. I chose to purchase this camera for its focusing abilities, the Ziess optics, and its rugged construction. Its predecessor met its end at a photo shoot with a baby in a bath tub, so knowing that it is water-proof up to a certain depth is extremely reassuring. I suggest this camera for anyone from the novice pocket photographer to the photo enthusiast or professional with a limited budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this camera !! I got it strictly to use for fishing. It has served that purpose well. It takes crisp HD video and wonderful quality pictures. The waterproof aspect is priceless. It has been bombproof so far. My favorite feature is that it turns on quickly by simply sliding down the front cover; boom, it's ready to go. This is important when dealing with nature, as it is unpredictable. Huge fan of this camera. In addition; the HD video quality is second to none. I have posted a bunch of videos, I took with this camera, to Facebook, and people are shocked they are from my "point and shoot", and not my higher end Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: rideabiketoday

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: my best ally for the holidays, it is a super versatile camera resistant to water, it takes pictures of excellent quality, it is very easy to use, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Ana Segnini

customer_reviews.title: Great camera poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great. It takes great pictures and works under water. I had the best time taking pictures in the pool and water rides. The only thing that I would complain about is the battery life. I have to carry 2 extra batteries to last a whole day of taking pictures and videos. Also switching modes is a little tricky. I usually can get around camera relatively easy but not with this one. I leave it on auto and it takes great shots. I have also played around with the continuous shooting. Still have to play around it with more to get the full benefits. I gave it four stars due to the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: IV

customer_reviews.title: Slim and waterproof AND easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This camera fits perfectly in the palm of your hand and in your pants pocket. It is about the size of a cell phone. The front slides down and the camera turns "on" and is ready to go. Slide the front back up, and the camera is "off". It is auto focus and auto flash. It is that easy to use! Working underwater is an added bonus. We bought this for our daughter who will be at the beach with her band. Teenagers HAVE to take photos of everything it seems and since her phone isn't waterproof, this is the next best thing. The photos are clear and sharp. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Greatest small SONY snapshot camera...Ever..!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, GOOD JOB SONY..!! This camera takes phenomenal pictures and movies in all kinds of conditions. Low light, during the day, even during a rain storm. Most situations are covered very well in the camera's automatic setting. Yes, if you are a 'professional camera enthusiast' you might want more of this and that but for the average picture taker like I am and legions of us are, this is the camera made for us. Check this one out before they are all gone. The pricing is really affordable for what you get. They are 'on sale' right now.
customer_reviews.author: Pcprntr

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed just yet
customer_reviews.text: So far the camera has been used one week and it froze up. Some pictures are wonderful, others are terrible. An entire night of our vacation photos came out a blur and it was set to the auto and then to the superior auto settings. Did take some nice photos from a moving car though and several nice panoramas. The small size makes keeping fingers out of the way difficult and finding the right buttons hard too. I have not yet used it underwater but am hoping at least this function works well. I am still trying to give this camera a chance and see if user error is my problem. I am hoping to have no more problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: takes a lickin', keeps on clickin'
customer_reviews.text: So far I've taken the camera out into the waves on big surf days several times. It takes great shots, as well as wonderful video. One bit of advice for users of this camera- make sure you get your fingers out of the way of the lens when you're bodysurfing- of course that it easier said than done. But, if you can do that, the camera can capture some really fun images. I gave it four stars because I think it still has room for improved functionality, particularly with respect to the touch screen in the water. But really, how much touch screen sensitivity is it fair to ask for when you're out in the surf?
customer_reviews.author: Rick LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: Sony TX-20 a Winner
customer_reviews.text: Here's a high quality still camera and a high quality HD video capture device. I especially like the steady shot feature when taking movies, many shots really look like I used a tripod. I appreciate the on-screen help for camera operation. I have not yet opened the owners manual. Color reproduction is great, the HDMI output delivers beautiful video on my 52 inch tv. I really love a high quality camera that easily fits in my pocket - I take it everywhere.. I highly recommend this camera to anyone - but be sure to buy an extra battery, you'll need it. for extended trips.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Simister

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's priced right, waterproof, and takes awesome pics and videos. We have owned another waterproof camera, and the quality doesn't even come close to this one. This is the perfect camera if you want nice looking pictures or HD video but will be in/around water or doing outdoorsy things that might knock the camera around. Durable, small, and even looks nice. Fits right in my husband's pocket. He originally didn't want a new camera b/c he says the iPhone takes pictures just fine, but after this purchase we take this with us just about everywhere now...and I see him use it more than the iPhone! Score!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Because of its small size, I take it almost everywhere. It's waterproof, dustproof, and shockproof features are perfect for a camera that I'll use exclusively for hiking and backpacking. Yet it's good looking enough to use everywhere! I'm still getting used to the small touch screen and still learning about all the great features of the DSC-TX20. I paid $298 for the black color and it shipped from Amazon. The DSC-TX20 replaces my previous camera (Pentax Optio H90) that my son talked me into giving him. I'm definitely not going to give him this one!!
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Died the first time I put it under water
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that my camera was probably defective. I bought it several months before a trip to Grand Cayman. It worked fine "above water". Two days after arriving in Grand Cayman, we went on a four stop snorkeling trip. After going under water one time, it no longer worked. I had no camera for the remainder of the trip. I appreciate the fact that Amazon took it back since it was past the return date. Although, I was charged 30.00 for a restocking fee...somewhat of a bummer since it was defective. I am sure it is a great camera...but, something was obviously wrong with me and I had no camera for our vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because a friend recommend it for its picture quality. In this regard it is excellent. It also has a number of nice features such as black and white photos etc and it is waterproof. I have used it in the sea a few times so can confirm it works. I had it as a amazon deal which made it excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT POINT AND SHOOT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a one day sale before the holidays and sold my Fuji XP50 and am happy that I upgraded!!!!! 12MP JPEG images which are larger than the RAW images I got with my old Canon Rebel XS DSLR, which use about 9-10 MP per uncompressed image. Excellent detail and focus all the way to the infinity point. I love the easy to use menus and the HDR setting is the best I seen yet, very accurate to the results I get with Photoshop without all the hassle and mess. This camera is perfect to take along if one wants to get excellent results and needs them fast and easy. Focuses even faster than my old DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: George L. J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful in bright light
customer_reviews.text: I've used this camera both in and out of the water on a Caribbean snorkeling excursion with great results. It exceeded my expectation for such a small and seemingly simple camera. The touchscreen is outstanding, easy to operate. My four star rating comes from performance in low light at my niece's wedding reception. I took this camera instead of my NEX-6 because I could slip it into my clutch purse. The photos I took were dark and blocky because I hate using flash. The NEX would have taken much better photos. But for outdoor and underwater photos, I do recommend this camera highly.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKay

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't tested this underwater so I can't speak to its durability or quality there, but for day to day use I've been very pleased. It takes sharp pictures and the shutter delay time is very short - much better than my previous camera (an Olympus). The features are nice without being overwhelming - I've gotten very acceptable results just using the auto settings and movies are sharp. The standard movie format it uses (Sony proprietary) did not work well with my photo software but I was able to change it to record in mp4 and haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Videos
customer_reviews.text: This is a great underwater camera. I recently took it to Tahiti and was amazed at the pictures and video when I got home and downloaded them on my computer. Buy an extra battery because you don't want to run out in the middle of something important (I do that with all my cameras). I have loaned this camera to a friend and they took amazing underwater pictures of the kids in the pool last weekend. Price is very reasonable and it's an excellent quality. (Unfortunately mine was missing the wrist strap in the box from Amazon.)
customer_reviews.author: Des Hope

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera, only wish the color I order came instead of the black I got!
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the DSC TX10, was damaged so I ordered this one as an upgrade to what I had. Does all it claims to do and very similar operation to the previous. My only problem is I thought I ordered the camera in blue as pictured but it showed up in black. Due to an upcoming vacation I had no time to return prior leaving on our trip. It's only a small inconvenience and doesn't affect the operations at all, just harder to find when I lay it down somewhere or put it in my black pacpack.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnfizz

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, but doesn't take the best pictures
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 is primarily rugged, and secondarily a camera. I was looking for something I could take with me discreetly and casually that would take better pictures than my iPhone 4s and that I wouldn't have to worry about treating roughly. Unfortunately I found that the TX20's photos were only marginally better than those taken by my iPhone. The user interface is very good, as is the touch screen. It might be a fine camera for those who aren't as picky about photo quality, or who are only looking to score style points.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Censor

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: For a compact camera this is it, nice and small and i can use the touch screen with my big fingers with no problem. Takes great pictures and i figured out all its functions very quick. Night or no light pictures are awesome, the macro function is great i can take pictures of my finger prints crystal clear. I have not nor will i use under water, i bought a camera to carry in my pack when i am hunting, fishing etc. that would hold up to a little rough handling and could take a little water splash, snow, humidity. I would recommend you put a screen protector on it as soon as you take it out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Purchase I Have Recently Made
customer_reviews.text: I got it on Special on Amazon for $149, i know that is not the standard price but it was a great deal. Now regarding the actual Camera, it takes amazing pics, I haven't tested it under water but it is truly water proof. Sprinkled water no damage which is awesome. The Pics color is amazing, no blurry pics either, now my final test is the test of time. Lets see how long would it last. The only Bad Thing i could see is that it would get scratch very easily, so make sure if you put in your pockets that you don't have anything sharp or metal.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an outdoorsy camera to replace my old waterproof Fujifilm that I loved, but it didn't have the best shooting options and had no lens protection. I love all the features of this camera. Touch-focus, panoramic, color select, etc... tons of stuff to play around with or get serious with. The sliding front is very thin and I'll be more careful with this than I was with my more rugged Fujifilm, but I'm more than happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pauli

customer_reviews.title: Good compact camera but not very good a water proofing
customer_reviews.text: We loved this camera while it lasted. It is very small and fits in your pocket. The pictures taken were beautiful. My kids loved various macros. We used this to take lot of underwater pictures too (not very deep). However it stopped working after we took it underwater in our last europe trip. Wish it was little better in keeping the water away
customer_reviews.author: Dalok

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic. Nice and small, waterproof, and it's automatic settings actually take really good, crisp shots. I normally used to haul out my Sony Alpha A57 with a couple of lenses, but since I purchased this, I actually don't worry and just slip this baby into my pocket, cause it serves it's purpose in most situations (most of which end up in family albums or in facebook albums either way, not professional work). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FJGC

customer_reviews.title: A great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have no intention of testing its highly touted waterproof features, but I find this to be an intuitive and easy to use device. The "face" detecting" feature puts a little square around each face it finds and you feel like you're watching "Person of Interest". It is not fooled by pictures of faces. Although I hesitate to carry it everywhere since I have my iPhone to take snapshots, when my intention is to take a lot of pictures, this is what I use. My only disappointment was that what looked like a viewfinder turned out to be the camera lens.
customer_reviews.author: rgbriggs

customer_reviews.title: Tough Mudder Durable!!
customer_reviews.text: I take this camera with me on my mud runs!! I typically put it into a plastic baggie, mainly to keep most of the mud off of it so that when I go to take a photo, I don't have to wipe it off with my already muddy hands. It has been through many races and actually has a chip in it now and continues to work just fine!! I love this camera and totally want a blue one! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camera but this one stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera... the picture quality is amazing and there are all kinds of functions for the photographer to take control of the settings for the ideal picture. Iʻve bought one in the past and loved it but I dropped it and the door broke so I canʻt use it underwater anymore. I bought this one to replace that one so that I can use one underwater however it broke after just one month of use. Will update how the return/exchange process was handled.
customer_reviews.author: SurferGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This camera rocks... clear photos and easy to use. I have more expensive cameras which I gave away after receiving this compact camera. It worked wonderfully in the ocean and pool as well as in a wide variety of settings. We dropped it once on a hike yet it endured without difficulty. An important note is to follow the directions which include rinsing it off in fresh water after you use it in the ocean. We did and have had no difficulties. This is a nifty little camera for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a previous version of the camera, which has been great, so it didn't take much convincing to buy this newer version for my fiance. She has since used it on hikes in both the US and Iceland, as well as for everyday activities, and it has worked wonderfully. The various filter settings allow for some fun photos as well. This camera hasn't been used under water yet, but if it works as well as mine does, it will be great for scuba diving. Overall, this is a fun camera that is durable and takes great quality pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lane

customer_reviews.title: Don't have took high hopes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for our family cruise and imagine my disappointment when on our snorkeling excursion, the camera kaputted. It left me with no more camera for the duration of the cruise! I've had the camera 7 months, and it takes nice pictures but I'm now missing out in my scrapbook of tons of pictures that I should have had! Very frustrated customer!! I expected more out of this camera after all the outside reviews. Lots of wasted money on this camera, but to mention the heartache!
customer_reviews.author: cdon

customer_reviews.title: Very intuitive interface
customer_reviews.text: I picked up the camera felt very at ease with the options and operations within a couple of minutes. I bought the camera for my wife who leads stream and river cleanups for a local watershed group and is VERY hard on cameras. She also found it very easy to use. Time will tell of its toughness. The only concern I have up front is the slide down cover for the lens and flash. It seems vulnerable to catch or clothing straps and small branches while walking through the marshes and woods.
customer_reviews.author: n3jkk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a review fanatic so I spent awhile going over many many waterproof cameras before I decided on this one. I have not tried it under water yet, but just using it around the house it's great. The quality is really good for such a little camera. I do professional photography, and wanted a small camera just to carry around for photos for when I don't want to lug around my big dslr. This camera is perfect, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LilChrissy

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever!
customer_reviews.text: I caught this on sale for $149. Immediately bought 3. Sony has not let me down with the quality of this piece. I replaced an older TX-5. This one is smaller and with the freeze/drop/dust/water proof capabilities I do not feel nervous at all when I throw it in my pocket to go out. I have never been let down by the TX Line of cameras. I have taken these offroading in the desert, snorkeling in salt water and on 2 trips around the world worry-free. This takes very high quality photos and the battery life is great. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for xmas. She used to used a canon elph. It was very slow and it wasn't giving her the pictures that she expected. When i gave her this she immediately could tell the difference. Her pictures are great and she loves that she can take videos of our son. Added bonus is that it is a rugged model so she doesn't have to get all worried if our 11 month son grabs it and drops it. Though i did purchase a warranty just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Waynetango

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. It is very small but it takes great pictures. I also love the underwater feature. I leave it on easy mode most of the time and I end up with great shots. I have used the video feature many times too. I love that I can keep it in my purse and pull it out in a jiffy. I also love that it doesn't take long for it to power on so I can capture moments in a flash. I dropped my first Sony Cyber-shot and broke the battery compartment door. I bought another one just like it because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAllThingsAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, awesome pictures
customer_reviews.text: I will keep this short and sweet. This camera is a great point and shoot for everyday use. The ability to take your camera everywhere and in any weather. I have taken this through cenotes, beaches, and many other harsh conditions for a normal camera and it came through with flying colors. I spent a week on the grand canyon rafting in wooden boats and this thing took a beating including being dropped from 4 feet onto solid rocks and kept taking stunning photos. Sony nailed it with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Rugged but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera during the Gold Box Deal of the Day ($164 after taxes). Pros - Many functions and mode choices: underwater shooting, panorama, etc. - Great for beach/water-related outings Con - Battery seem to drain quickly, especially with underwater function - Processing time of photos creates lag between shots - Focus is sometimes off and create blurred images
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this camera for some upcoming adventures. Got to test it out yesterday at Discovery Cove in Orlando, Fl. and it worked great. Went into the water with no problems and starting shooting video and taking pictures. It was great to be able to switch between photo and video so easily. Don't expect the best pictures in the world, but they are great for a point-n-shoot camera. Can't wait to take this on our next adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment. Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This dust proof, water proof, shock proof camera is well worth the purchase. I have had this camera for a few years and it still works as though it's brand new. I take this camera out daily and don't need to worry about it. Because if it rains or drops it still works. The great thing about this camera is that it looks so sleek and polished compared to other similar cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Galicinao

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but get familiar with user interface
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a pocket which is very handy when traveling. Takes surprisingly great shots and video. We have an older version of this camera and love it so much we bought this one. I love the photos and videos it takes, but navigating the user interface to adjust settings is a nightmare. Do yourself a favor and use this camera in a variety of settings to get comfortable with navigating the user interface before you take this camera to anything important like a vacation or sentimental occasion. I usually do this with all new cameras, but since we owned the older version did not, and paid for it when we took this backcountry sea kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Bear

customer_reviews.title: If only you can self focus macros
customer_reviews.text: So this is the best PS camera I've purchased so far... shutter speed VN! on and off very easy - just slide the front panel. Pictures and videos are clear in and out of water. Some of the limited features include: Background defocus only - you cannot focus on a specific item like your typical Macro settings... it only gives option to background defocus Color Pop shots - you cannot point at a color and have the selected color burst. You can only choose from the default colors available in the camera (primary colors) - hated this fact, but I have a secondary PS cam I can use instead.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x Zoom
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived quickly. It's waterproof, but that wasn't my reason for purchasing. I go through at least a camera a year because they all lose focus, possibly because they are carried in a purse and jostled about quite a biit. This camera is advertized as shockproof. I used it for the first time yesterday and was pleased with the size (smaller than a smartphone) and ease of use. Only time will tell about the shockproof part..
customer_reviews.author: MsPop

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for exactly one year.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera on my birthday in 2013 and used it frequently as I traveled throughout Mexico. The pictures were very good and the waterproof feature worked great. Then, on my birthday in 2014, it got wet and, though it was properly sealed and attended to, the water seeped into the battery compartment and the camera was ruined. Basically, this is a lovely camera but has a limited lifespan. I was very disappointed. I could not replace it in Mexico (electronics are very expensive there) and lost hundreds of photos because the memory card was also ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: One of my best cameras
customer_reviews.text: gopro, sony HDR action cams? You know what? this is also an option. I have been using these DSC cameras since 2006 starting with DSC-T5. With this version, I recorded videos at six flags water park, I'm recording snowboarding, and diving videos. This is one little great camera. I just ordered sony cyber-shot dsc-tx30 to see how it is like. I'm a big fan of this little camera. Buying a Cyber-shot DSC camera is no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Fun Camera - In and Out of the Water
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun camera. I previously had the TS100 (similar but not a touchscreen or waterproof model) and the TX10. My TX10 mysteriously stopped working after I loaned it to my brother to use in the Caribbean, and I initially bought a cheaper waterproof Panasonic camera to replace it. The Panasonic didn't take very good pictures, so I sold it and upgraded to the TX20. It's been fun to have, especially in the pool, at the lake, hiking, at sporting events when it's raining, etc., and it takes good pictures both in and out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: great pics under water and out of water i love this camera and when it has a fabric case on i don't have to worry about throwing it in the water or jumping in with it really cool and very awesome first five minutes of using it i put in a bowl of water to test it out great battery too which seems like a big problem when looking to buy a waterproof camera
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time for a waterproof and rugged small camera. I am so glad I purchased this. Takes great pictures. Easy to use. Easy to upload on computer to store or print. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rachel drennan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera on an Amazon one day sale for half the price and if I knew how great it was i would have paid full price a long time ago!!! This camera is so easy to use and the pictures are crisp and clear even in low light!!! Its small and convenient to carry and I would HIGHLY recommend this product for anyone looking for a GREAT camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.O.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great little waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: It performs well for what it's designed to do. Always remember to check the seals before it takes a dip in the water. Picture quality is really good for a point and shoot. We purchased this to throw in my wife's purse so we don't have to lug around the nikon all the time. I may purchase the marine pack in the future to take it on dives, but for now we just use it snorkeling and on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: FLGatorengineer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome replacement for my fantastic Cyber Shot which I'd dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome replacement for my fantastic Cyber Shot which I'd dropped after many years of good use and broken the hatch latch for the battery. This replacement was a wonderful price and got here quickly and even better than the older model of the same camera. Seller shipped quickly and packed well, too.
customer_reviews.author: JO in DC

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera during an amazon deal - so I only paid $140 for it. I'm still getting used to it and learning how to use all the features - but there are a ton of shooting options and is pretty intuitive - once you get over all the options (fireworks, snow, beach, underwater, pets, gourmet, soft, superior, 3D, toy camera, etc etc etc...)! I love that its waterproof too!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not a water camera - dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for couple of years.. only really use it a few times when getting wet is a possibility. Last week on a boat trip it got really wet.. guess what it just shuts down. I thought it's battery ran out. It was disappointing because I cannot take any pictures during the trip. But it never recovered. It is dead Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fong

customer_reviews.title: best pocket camera!
customer_reviews.text: IMO this camera can't be beat. The macro is amazing. This camera is so small you take out anywhere and nobody will notice. It does take a little time to process low light pictures but they come out good. If you have really large hands, the touch screen could be difficult to use because the icons are very small.
customer_reviews.author: Cjwhittington

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera, everything on the photographic side is relatively easy to use. The only downside is that it doesn't come with a separate battery charger, it's built in, so you have to plug the camera into the wall. It would be preferable to have a spare battery so it can be charging while you are using the camera and being able to swap batteries for events like weddings etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have done quite a bit of research about this camera and have found that it is one of the best cameras in it's class. I have to say, I am weary about the water seals because i have heard about them drying up or being flimsy, but for the most part this camera definitely deserves all the praise and awards. I have taken this camera to china for sight seeing, family outings, rafting, swimming in the pool, and even zip-lining. It has definitely held its own and still works great. It takes great digital pictures and it's quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Little J

customer_reviews.title: Glad I took a chance on this great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Purchased the camera at a great price and it takes fantastic pictures outside in natural light. We went to Universal Studios, Orlando and took pictures of the Harry Potter Hogwarts Castle and other attractions. The photos look fantastic and the small size makes it ideal for vacation use. I haven't used the camera for under water photos yet, but look forward to using that feature.
customer_reviews.author: fineartsfan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Camera
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this camera. It takes great indoor and outdoor pictures. We have a SLR camera that we love but is big and bulky, I can keep this one in my purse and it works great. Went to Ripley's aquarium with it and the lighting is very dim/non existant in places this camera took good quality pictures with vibrant colors. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water parks, maybe you should buy an extra battery
customer_reviews.text: I used the camera in a recent trip which involved water parks and I am delighted with its features. With it was possible to take some pictures (in a subterrain river, for example) and videos (snorkeling) impossible with a normal one. The quality for the pictures is great. Underwater quality is ok. Video stabilization is wonderful. There was this video that I took while on an anfibious car with lots of bumps, and I was sorprised when reviewing the video, almost no shake in it. Pros - Almost worries-free Cons - Removing half star for battery life. I missed afternoon photos on 1 water park. - Removing half star for screen brightness. So dificult to see underwater when recording video.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I am an owner of an SLR, so point and shoots don't impress me. I have had a couple in the past and the picture quality always disappointed me.. hey I have high expectations. This camera has great picture quality. I took it to the inauguration ball with the President and was able to get some qality shots from a distance. The touch screen is a little annoying, but I am getting used to it. It also has some nice features and the ability to take pics in a range of settings
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick pictures in wet environments.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for a couple of months to take pictures of fish species while working on fishing boats in the Bering Sea. It is easily washed free of any salt spray but I have not used it fully submerged. The picture quality is great and it takes clear pictures in low light and shaky conditions. Its small size means that I can keep it securely out of the way in a pocket instead of taking off all my raingear and trekking inside to fetch it. I gave it four stars though because there doesn't seem to be a way to disable immediate picture review after each shot.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Don't like this camera
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing is when you upload pics to computer it changes the format for all your pics. Also, you can't upload videos to Facebook, I don't usually give bad reviews without allowing time to get used to the product but it has been long enough. I guess its good for divers so they can use it under water, I wouldn't know have not done that get.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Florida

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous camera
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, Sony makes the best point and shoot camera. I used to have a Kodak and I thought the flash always washed me out. Sony's Cybershot takes excellenet photos and I really like the design of the settings and menu system overall. This camera is super durable and streamlined. I would recommened this camera to anyone. I am so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for over a year now, and I really dont have ANY complaints about it. Love the fact that its waterproof. It takes GREAT pictures and its small and easy to take with me anywhere. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a compact camera that takes GREAT quality pictures. No regrets after purchasing this camera, over a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Haili

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace my Nikon coolpix which stopped charging after 3 years. I was looking for something more sturdy and I think thsi was a good choice. I bought it when it was on special so the price was equivalent to the Nikon. You have to get used to the sliding cover and a few times my finger was covering part of the lense. I got used to it quickly. I am impressed with the quality of close ups. Overall I would recommend it - I really like that it autoomatically discovers the mode it needs and also the multiple focus feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bargainlady

customer_reviews.title: Decent compact camera
customer_reviews.text: The size is awesome. The battery life is decent. The pictures are nice and clear. However, the ONLY reason I bought this camera was for the underwater feature.....yes it is waterproof....but the underwater pictures are terrible! So much so that I purchased a different camera for my next Caribbean vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Dazeek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: We have a really nice DSLR camera and this is the perfect addition to our camera family. It's a great small point and shoot that turns out great pictures. Haven't used the underwater feature yet, but plan to on a vacation later this year. With a toddler in the house, you never know when a camera will get dropped in water anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not Shock proof, so don't drop it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked great underwater, and it takes decent pictures. Just don't drop it, it's not shock proof. The corner of this camera is thin plastic and when I dropped it it cracked. I didn't know that it cracked, so I took it in the pool with me. It stopped working altogether, but luckily after I left it alone for a week, it started to work again. Now i just have a regular camera, not shock or waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tom. P

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: At first I was surprised at the smalll size. This is my first digital camera. As an artist, I use film with great results. I did have a problem, however with the color reproduction in the images when i photographed some of my paintings. The colors are not true, but this is to be expected with an inexpensive camera. On the whole it is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: sadie mae 212

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you need an underwater camera.
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't have choosen a better camera for our trip to Cancun. Waterproof, very nice picture quality, responsive, very good zoom for a small factor camera, lightweight and the videos are top notch! I was seeing other people with those disposable waterproof cameras and felt sorry about them. Don't do that! Buy this one and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Castelazo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had this one in grey for myself. So I got this for my sister in law, and she just simply loved it. It's very handy and has very good picture quality with different settings, including the panorama (my personal favourite). This also comes with a small touch stick that could be hung to the tag which I find really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Shantanu Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cute
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used it quite a bit so far. Taking pics in the house. I like the little feature where even if it's dark like in a room, it makes the pic look like it was taken in bright light. Helps alot with me keeping my house pretty dark in the evenings. I hate too much bright light. Bothers me alot and this camera is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Truck stop card shop

customer_reviews.title: It survived the middle east!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father to use while he was deployed to the middle east. He used it almost daily and subjected it to more punishment than it was probably meant to take. He has been back for a few months now and still loves this camera and uses it often!
customer_reviews.author: R. Debonise

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos and it is smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos and it is smaller than expected, I wish I had known to buy a memory card. the camera only hold like maybe five pics with its internal memory. Great camera, the size grows on you.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Kann

customer_reviews.title: Sony Claims Camera is Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof camera suffered from internal corrosion, apparently not covered by warranty as the corrosion was "not caused by liquid" and therefore the camera is still waterproof. Service technician could not answer any of my question, stated furthermore that "I should have purchased an extended warranty" Really, pay more to enforce the quality of the camera or to ensure that your claims of being waterproof are accurate? Sad
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great camera w/fragile LCD.
customer_reviews.text: With no view finder, the screen stopped working and no way to take pics. Screen is fragile, did not go through any trauma that should have broken it to my knowledge. Otherwise great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Children's Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this right before my trip to europe and it was a great savior to me. I took lots of pictures, literally thousands, and its battery lasted me all day without a problem. Also it's waterproof which is useful, although i've been too afraid to test that out.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera around Christmas for what I think is a great price. The camera is simple to operate and takes great pictures. Haven't had it exposed to any serious moisture conditions yet but the doors and gaskets look like they'll hold up well to any unplanned dunks during our summer canoe and kayak trips.
customer_reviews.author: JNB

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Warranty Service, Don't trust Sony
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Purchase this camera. As many have posted it will likely fail within the warranty period but Sony will not honor the warranty. The "repair" facility in Laredo will provide a $441.52 estimate to fix a leaking camera and claim that you, the user, exceeded the limits of the camera. The number on the website 866-357-6230 is staffed by a representative unfamiliar with claims and may hang up on you after you have waited about 30 minutes to speak with someone. Olympus has much better customer service on their waterproof cameras.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: this camera is awes...
customer_reviews.text: the first is that i got it 4 a lowest price ever seen 4 this camera. The camera shoots very nice pictures in low light ,the Full hd video needs a lot of energy so you may get 50 minutes of recording before the battery die, which its fine 4 a little battery,get other battery 4 back up,If you decide to buy it you'll be very happy
customer_reviews.author: Serj

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I've ever owned. Takes beautiful pictures. My only complaint is that I ordered a blue camera & was shipped a black camera. Although it worked beautifully for our trip to the Grand Canyon the day after I received the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing pictures and is small and lightweight. I have taken pictures in the sun, snow, at kids events and in the pool. I was also impressed with the pictures it took in the pool but the camera stopped working (bad seam) and I had to return it (hence the 4 stars). The next time I am in the water I will update the review once I have retested it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Camera - Horrible Lens
customer_reviews.text: It's clear Sony knew they pooped the bed with this model with the massive price drop. I didn't care though, I needed an outdoor camera and this was a great price for what I needed. If you are looking for good quality photos that you can blow up to 8.5 x 11, get the next model.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: super sleek
customer_reviews.text: was surprised to hold the unit after opening the box due to its size. i know its a point & shoot but i never reckoned that it was gonna be this small for a waterproof shockproof unit. i have owned different brands with the same characteristics but this is by far the best in terms of looks. elegant and distinctly suave. have yet to test it underwater and will update my review soon
customer_reviews.author: Duped

customer_reviews.title: Small & Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for an adventure trip to Costa Rice. It performed very well both in water and out. The artistic settings took really great pictures. One of the things I really enjoyed was its compact size. Normally we have to take a bulky waterproof and then another thin camera to go out at night. This one both of those cameras in one. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ARaul

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera when it was on sale for 149.99 and glad I got it. The camera is originally about $399 and thought that was too much. This camera is awesome and touch screen. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it doesn't come with a memory card at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sujung18

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Sony very years and I've always been satisfied with their overall product. And to hear that they came out with a waterproof camera was music to my ears. The item described arrived in a timely manner and as published on the site. I'm very satisfied with my product. I'm still playing with the features and I shall fully test the product out next week in the water.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Highly Impressive
customer_reviews.text: For the size of the unit you are concerned about how it is supposed to survive a fall, let alone work underwater. Suffice it to say it was incredible under water snorkling, and we were able to clearly video a ray swimming underneath. Takes excellent panoramic pictures as well - no downsides so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool camera!
customer_reviews.text: I took this to some Springs while kayaking and let me just say this little guy is awesome. I love the slick and sleekness of it. It took clear pictures underwater. The panorama part of this camera is an excellent features and has many settings to chose from. I was glad to see it was touch screen as well.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I took a close up picture on an automatic setting, it didn't turn out, so I just changed the automatic setting on it.. Only error this camera makes is operator error. It takes perfect pictures. I have even moved the camera during a shot and the picture still turned out perfect! It shoots quick, I have yet to miss a shot..
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, easily broken important piece
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera almost two years and overall it's been good in terms of picture quality and durability. I've taken pictures in/under water that have turned out great, and for a general purpose camera i've been pleased. I was disappointed though when the very tiny clip that keeps the SD card door closed broke for no apparent reason making closing this door impossible. I was able to gorilla glue it so it somewhat closes, but I can't trust it to be waterproof anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I bought it a year after buying another camera that I never liked. My first camera was a Sony and I should have stuck with this brand. This camera takes amazing pictures and is small and not heavy! Love the color and it's easy to use!!!! Battery charges fast and holds a good charge!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome images...underwater!
customer_reviews.text: I do love this camera. I took it to Mexico and took some awesome pics! Unfortunately, some water found its way in ruining the camera.... BUT Sony replaced it no questions asked. The second camera has had NO issues at all! Thank You SOny!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: solids performance, tiny footprint
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my sister. its an upgrade on the old tx10 model which i had and loved. the panoramic feature is the best on the market i think. and its great that its so slim. more of a fashion camera with a bit of waterproofing, i never considered this as the most rugged camera. my old tx10 model held up for 2 years at the beach so i imagine this will do as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Our 5-yr old Sony DSC T10 point-n-shoot died bcos it got dropped a lot of times during vacations and finally got lost for about 1/2 an hour at the beach. We found it but the sand managed to penetrate into the lens casing causing focus to not work. We were looking for the same kinds when this model showed up on Daily Deals on Amazon. We bought it in a heartbeat given how good our last one was. This is the 5th generation of T-series cameras from Sony and we love all the new features this one has including being waterproof!!
customer_reviews.author: jazzyMe83

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this little camera. I have owned other cyber-shots before and by far this is the best one so far. Taking the camera to the swimming pool and capturing pics and videos in HD of the kids was priceless. Even went underwater taking videos of the kids diving. The video came out perfect in HD. This camera is going everywhere I go. Durable and weather/water proof, this camera is right for me. At $200, you can't go wrong. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my trip to Europe and the pics came out amazing. My older model Sony camera always blurred and came out with spots whenever I would zoom in but this one doesn't do it at all. The video feature comes in handy and the quality of the pictures I took came out better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for any mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife who wants to take pics of my kid playing at the pool everyday. She loves its easy menu system and excellent image quality. Of course it is a way better than her iPhone 4 camera and Sony HX5 she used to have for last two years. She is using it with Eye-fi SD card and they works like an amazing duo and images transfer to iPhone 4 extremely easy. Using it underwater also works quite well and my whole family is enjoying every single day. FIVE STAR and Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Soobeen Chae

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Orange) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description: Color:OrangeTake to the sea, the slopes or the streets with complete confidence when you wield this ruggedized Sony Cyber-shot(R) DSC-TX20 digital camera. Waterproof, dustproof, shockproof and slim enough to slip into your pocket and take anywhere, this tough little camera stands up to the elements and your active lifestyle to capture the action as it unfolds. With a top-notch 16.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor and Full HD 1080/60i video capture (records in 29-minute segments), you'll walk away with high quality mementos of every adventure. Shoot up to 10 frames per second (fps) so you never miss a moment, then relive the fun when you review your photos and HD video on the big, 3.0" touchscreen Xtra Fine LCD. Optical SteadyShot(R) with Active Mode - For blur-free movies even while walking Background Defocus - The system takes two shots, identifies the background and applies a defocused background keeping the subject crisp and clearSpecifications Sensor Size / Total Pixels / Filter - 1/2.3-inch Exmor R CMOS / 16.8 Total Megapixels / RGB Primary Color Filter Effective Pixels - 16.2 Megapixels Lens - Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Optical Zoom - 4x Focal Length (35mm equivalent) - Still 16 - 9 - 27-08mm / Still 4 - 3 - 25-100mm / Movie 16 - 9 - 27-108mm & 4 - 3 - 33-132mm(Optical SteadyShot(R) Standard) Steady Shot Mode Active - Yes LCD - 3.0 Xtra Fine LCD (921K dots) Storage Media - Optional MS DUO/PRO DUO/PRO HG DUO & SD/SDHC/SDXC media Still Image Size (JPEG) - Up to 16 - 9 12M(4,608 2,592) / 4 - 3 16M(4,608x3,456) Video Mode - Up to AVCHD 60i - 24M FX/ 17M FH(1,920 x 1,080/60i) / MP4 - 12M(1,440 x 1,080/30fps) / 3M VGA(640 x 480/30fps) ISO - Auto, 100 - 3200 Flash - Built-in Microphone/Speaker - Stereo/mono Wind Noise Reduction - Off/on Interface - Multi Type3b (AV/USB/DC IN) High-speed USB 2.0, Micro HDMI Power - Li-ion NP-BN 3.6V Dimensions (Approx.) - 3 7/8 x 2 1/4 x 23/32(95.9
feature_bullets: 16.2 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
Full HD 1080/60i with dual record of stills and movies

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars593 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
